Date: Monday, 9/15/1989
Subject: Progress of Henry Mercedes
Dear Sir,
Henry Mercedes is hitting the ball well at A San Jose Giants!
He has an AVG of .304, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Playing time

I am not very happy about my playing time recently.
I think I deserve a starting spot!

Regards,
Domingo Ramos
